sentences: Philip Weech (The Bahamas) chaired informal consultations on possible options to respond to late payment of contributions.

The group considered the text outstanding from SB- 12, including problems and inconveniences that could be faced by the UNFCCC as a result of late payments to the core budget, and additional options the SBI may wish to consider as a basis for recommendations to the COP.
The text was deferred for further informal discussions on Thursday afternoon.
enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
